headline: Dollar General Announces Call for Small Businesses
summary: GOODLETTSVILLE, Tenn., June 30, 2025--DG announces a call for small businesses seeking to learn more about serving as a vendor or service provider for the Company.

headline: Dollar General (NYSE:DG) Removed From Russell 1000 Defensive Index
summary: Dollar General (NYSE:DG) was recently removed from the Russell 1000 Defensive Index, a major event that coincided with the company's stock climbing 31% over the last quarter. This rise in share price aligns with positive market sentiment, as broader indices like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq reached new highs, reflecting optimism in various sectors, including retail. Dollar General's impressive earnings report and raised guidance, alongside strategic store expansions and product innovations, likely...

headline: What the $1 trillion rural wallet means for Walmart, Amazon
summary: The battle for rural consumers is heating up, and major US companies are investing heavily to win the country road.

raw.summary: The battle for rural consumers is heating up, and major US companies are investing heavily to win the country road.

headline: How the Market Has Changed Since It Was Last Breaking Records—Streetwise
summary: Stocks that seemed to have missed out on the tech and artificial-intelligence booms, such as hard-drive maker Seagate, tax-software firm Intuit and chipmaker AMD went from the middle or bottom of the S&P performance league to near the top.  Consumer staples—led by discount retailer Dollar General, the market’s best performer since Feb. 19 as it rebounded from a miserable 2024—beat the consumer-discretionary sector, usually a sign of concern about growth.

raw.headline: How the Market Has Changed Since It Was Last Breaking Records—Streetwise
raw.summary: Stocks that seemed to have missed out on the tech and artificial-intelligence booms, such as hard-drive maker Seagate, tax-software firm Intuit and chipmaker AMD went from the middle or bottom of the S&P performance league to near the top.  Consumer staples—led by discount retailer Dollar General, the market’s best performer since Feb. 19 as it rebounded from a miserable 2024—beat the consumer-discretionary sector, usually a sign of concern about growth.

headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks with Questionable Fundamentals
summary: When Wall Street turns bearish on a stock, it’s worth paying attention. These calls stand out because analysts rarely issue grim ratings on companies for fear their firms will lose out in other business lines such as M&A advisory.

raw.headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks with Questionable Fundamentals
raw.summary: When Wall Street turns bearish on a stock, it’s worth paying attention. These calls stand out because analysts rarely issue grim ratings on companies for fear their firms will lose out in other business lines such as M&A advisory.
